content: note pattern revised & updated on 04-26-22 >get ready for cooler weather with this classic aran knit sweater skill level intermediate to fit bust/chest xs/s 28-34 / 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 /91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 / 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 / 112-117 cm 2/3 xl 48-54 / 122-137 cm 4/5 xl 56-62 / 142-157 5 cm finished bust/chest xs/s 40 / 101 5 cm m 44 / 112 cm l 47 / 119 5 cm xl 53 / 134 5 cm 2/3xl 57 / 144 5 cm 4/5xl 62 / 157 5 cm patons classic wool worsted 3 5 oz/100 g 210 yds/192 m natural mix 00229 8-9-10-11-13-15 balls sizes u s 6 4 mm and u s 8 5 mm knitting needles gauge 19 sts x 25 row = 4 / 10cm in stocking stitch
